field.label: Enabled
field.help: Enable this automation.

field.label: Name
field.help: Name to identify this automation.

field.label: Description
field.help: Description for this automation.

field.label: Run Command
field.help: Pre-defined commands for this automation.

field.label: Account Hash
field.help: Account hash for Highwinds API.

field.label: Access Token
field.help: Access token for Highwinds API.

field.label: SFTP Host
field.help: IP address or hostname of the SFTP server.

field.label: SFTP Port
field.help: SFTP server port. Leave blank to use default "22".

field.label: Host Key
field.help: SFTP server host key, formatted as in 'known_hosts'. Leave blank to auto accept host key on first connect (not as secure as specifying it).

field.label: Username
field.help: The username to login to the SFTP server.

field.label: Identity Type
field.help: The type of identify to present to the SFTP server for authorization. Select 'none' to use default "ECDSA".

field.label: Remote Path
field.help: Path on the SFTP server to change to after login. The path can be absolute or relative to home and must exist. Leave blank to not change path after login.

field.label: Permission (Public Keys)
field.help: Unix permission to apply to uploaded public keys. Leave blank to use default "0440".

field.label: Permission (Private Keys)
field.help: Unix permission to apply to uploaded private keys. Leave blank to use default "0400".

field.label: Group
field.help: Unix group id to apply to all uploaded files. Leave blank to not change the group.

field.label: Naming "cert.pem"
field.help: Name template for the public certificate. Placeholders "{{name}}" and "%s" are replaced by the name of the certificate being uploaded. Leave blank to use default "{{name}}/cert.pem".

field.label: Naming "key.pem"
field.help: Name template for the certificate's private key. Placeholders "{{name}}" and "%s" are replaced by the name of the certificate being uploaded. Leave blank to use default "{{name}}/key.pem".

field.label: Naming "ca.pem"
field.help: Name template for the public certificate chain file. Placeholders "{{name}}" and "%s" are replaced by the name of the certificate being uploaded. Leave blank to use default "{{name}}/ca.pem".

field.label: Naming "fullchain.pem"
field.help: Name template for the public certificate fullchain file (cert + ca). Placeholders "{{name}}" and "%s" are replaced by the name of the certificate being uploaded. Leave blank to use default "{{name}}/fullchain.pem".

field.label: SSH Host
field.help: IP address or hostname of the SSH server.

field.label: SSH Port
field.help: SSH server port. Leave blank to use default "22".

field.label: Host Key
field.help: SSH server host key, formatted as in 'known_hosts'. Leave blank to auto accept host key on first connect (not as secure as specifying it).

field.label: Username
field.help: The username to login to the SSH server.

field.label: Identity Type
field.help: The type of identify to present to the SSH server for authorization. Select 'none' to use default "ECDSA".

field.label: Command
field.help: The command to execute on the SSH server.

field.label: System Command
field.help: Select a pre-defined system command which should be run.

field.label: Synology Hostname
field.help: Hostname of IP adress of the Synology DSM, i.e. synology.example.com or 192.168.0.1.

field.label: Synology Port
field.help: Port that will be used when connecting to Synology DSM.

field.label: Scheme
field.help: Connection scheme that will be used when uploading certificates to Synology DSM.

field.label: Username
field.help: Username to login, must be an administrator.

field.label: Device ID
field.help: If Synology DSM has OTP enabled, then the device ID has to be provided so that no OTP is required when running the automation.

field.label: Create certificates
field.help: This option ensures that a new certificate is created in Synology DSM if it does not exist yet. If unchecked only existing certificates will be updated.

field.label: FRITZ!Box URL
field.help: URL of the router, i.e. https://fritzbox.example.com.

field.label: Unifi keystore file
field.help: Path to the Unifi keystore file in the local filesystem, i.e. /usr/local/share/java/unifi/data/keystore.

field.label: Vault URL
field.help: URL of the Vault, i.e. http://vault.example.com:8200.

field.label: Vault Prefix
field.help: This specifies the prefix path in Vault.

field.label: Use KV v2
field.help: If checked version 2 of the kv store will be used, otherwise version 1.
